title: Pet Nail Grinder with LED Light & 2 Grinding Heads, 2-Speed Low Noise & More Powerful Dog Nail Grinder, Pet Nail Trimmer File, Painless Paw Claw Care, Quiet Toenail Grooming Tool for L/M/S Dogs/Cats
features: 【LED Light & Super Strong & Quiet Motor & 2 Speed】 - Equip a LED light that allows you to see the location of pets’ nail blood line easier, avoiding over-grinding and hurt. This Dog Nail Trimmer uses a brass bearing motor , comes with 2 Speed fast rotation (7500/9000 rpm). With the features of low vibration and low noise (less than 35 db), your pet will not be afraid to trim nails

【More Powerful For Thick Long Nails with 2 Grinding Heads】 - Equipped a large capacity Ni-MH rechargeable battery, which has a larger discharge current, making the motor 5 times stronger than the old version, which makes it trim thick and long nails of big breed pets quickly and smoothly. (Note: Totally has 2 grinding heads, one has been installed in the grinder, the other one is spare.)

【Safe & Effective】 - With the LED light and made of diamond emery ,our Dog Nail Grinder wheel can quickly and safely trim your pet's nails, safer and more effective than Dog Nail Clippers to reduce your pet's fear of clipping toenails and the risk of over cutting and hurting your pet.

【Three Size Ports】 - There are 3 size openings in the grinder area, you can use depending on your pet's nail size. The Small and medium openings are for small and medium sized pets. For larger pets, the entire cover can be removed to expose the entire bit to easily trim large nails.

【Rechargeable & Portable】 - The cordless dog grinder is rechargeable and has an indicator light on the bottom that turns on when charging. Each grinder has a built-in battery that lasts 6 hours after a 4 hours charge. The lightweight and ergonomic body design also makes it easier to handle in your right or left hand.
description: Product Description With Bright LED Light, Make Trimming Pet Nails Safer, Faster, Easier, and More Affordable! Why customers choose our pet nail grinder ? 1. Equip a LED light that allows you to see the location of pets’ nail blood line easier, avoiding over-grinding and hurt. 2. More Powerful Motor to trim thick and long nails quickly and smoothly. 3. The extra-quiet (less than 35 dB) and low-vibration motor prevent your pet from getting scared. 4. Come with 2 Diamond emery bit grinding heads for Safe & Effective nail trimming. 5. Note: Totally has 2 grinding heads, one has been installed in the grinder, and the other one is spare ！ 6. Rapid full-charged in 4 hours and runs for up to 6 hours. 7. Two Speed (7500/9000 rpm) and 3 Ports for different situation use. 8. Cordless design allows you to trim with enhanced ease. 9. Suitable for most pets including small, medium, and large-size dogs/cats/birds/rabbits. 10. Battery charge indicator light reminds you to charge it when it's low power. 11. Provided by the professional pet nail grinder manufacturer, much safer than nail clippers. So Quiet & Low Vibration - Less Than 35 dB. No More Afraid of Grinding Nails! Diamond Bit Grinder Uses an advanced diamond drum bit grinder which provides more comfortable and safe pet claw grinding than nail clippers quickly and smoothly. Note: Totally has 2 grinding heads, one has been installed in the grinder, the other one is spare ！ 3 Grinding Ports & 2 Speeds for Different Needs 2 Speed (7500/9000 rpm) and 3 ports are available for small, medium, and large pets, such as Dogs, Cats, Guinea Pigs, Birds. Tips: the white protective sleeve is removable. Remove it if necessary while grinding. USB Rechargeable & Portable The cordless, portable pet grinder built-in battery that lasts 6 hours after a 4-hour charge. (Power adapter is not included, please plug into phone adapter / power bank / laptop.) Keep Away From Hurting Both for Your Pets and for Yourself ! How to Use and Trim Pet Nails Effectively? 1. Let your pets smell and listen to the nail grinder to get used to it. 2. Choose a proper port according to your pet's nail characteristics and put the nails into a port gently for no longer than 5 seconds each time by around 45° oblique. 3. Especially for the large dogs' thick nails, it's recommended to cut off the nails with a nail clipper first and then put the nails gently on the grinding wheel. 4. Reward dogs with snacks to help them develop good habits of grinding nails. Note: 1. For some small or anxious dogs, you need to take more patience and more time to accustom the dog to the noise and use low speed only. 2. Our nail grinder kit includes a USB cable but without an adaptor to fit different countries' voltages. Easy to charge with your phone adapter/power bank/laptop. 3. Trim the dog nail at a right angle. 4. Note: Totally has 2 grinding heads, one has been installed in the grinder, the other one is spare ！ Specification： Charging Time: 4 hours; Running time: Up to 6 hours Product Size: 15 * 3 * 3 CM Package include: 1 * Pet nail grinder with a LED light 2* Grinding wheels 1 * User manual 1 * USB charge cable Dog Nail Grinder with Light & 2 Grinding Heads 3.0 Softer Cat Self Groomer with Catnip 1 Pack 3.0 Softer Cat Self Groomer with Catnip 2 Pack Cat Toys Ball with LED Light Cat Toys Ball with LED Light Bell Feather 6 Pack Round Filters Buying Options Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Buying Options Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.1 out of 5 stars 2,790 4.0 out of 5 stars 6,621 4.0 out of 5 stars 6,621 3.9 out of 5 stars 9,300 3.9 out of 5 stars 9,300 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,836 Price £16.99 £ 16 . 99 £5.95 £ 5 . 95 £8.95 £ 8 . 95 £9.98 £ 9 . 98 — no data £9.95 £ 9 . 95 Target Breeds Dogs, Cats Cats Cats Cats Cats Cats, Dogs You may also enjoy these products: Pet nail grinder with light, 2 speed, 2 grinding heads, 3 size ports; ultra-quiet, rechargeable. The grinding head made of diamond emery can quickly and safely trim your pet's nails. 3.0 cat brush is made of softer and durable bristles, ensuring gentle massage and grooming when removing loose hair. Mount it on a wall, insert catnip and watch your cat groom itself! 3.0 cat brush is made of softer and durable bristles, ensuring gentle massage and grooming when removing loose hair. Mount it on a wall, insert catnip and watch your cat groom itself! The cat toy ball automatically moves randomly and glows red to get your kitty's attention. Place it on floor and let the ball play with your pet! Upgraded cat toy ball with feather and bell, two lights and catnip. It automatically moves randomly and glows red or colored light to get your kitty's attention. Put it on floor and let the ball play with your pet! Our Filters add 50% more coconut shell activated carbon than others. The water is triple-filtered to become healthy and taste better.
